```{r}
input <- read_lines(here("data/input/2015/07_input"))

int2bit <- function (x, nBits = 16){
   tail(rev(as.numeric(intToBits(x))),nBits)
}

bit2int <- function(bin, x, y) {
  Reduce(function(x,y) x*2+y, bin)
}

bit2int(int2bit(123))
```

```{r}
ff <- match.fun("bitwShiftL")
ff

int2bit(3)
int2bit(ff(3, 10))
```
